divs: Sighting Detailssitting on the deck smoking a cigar and drinking a beer when I noticed several objects in the sky. My wife had come home from work and she noticed them also. I have seen these objects before. Objects were flying very fast at times, changing directions, hovering. Got the camera and took pictures. tried the video camera also. I took over 200 pics, some good some not so good.
Summary: white luminesent objects flying around. one dark red object stationary.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bethalto
There were no other sightings in Bethalto on or around October 13th 2013
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
